alert.note: Alert for Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:20AM EDT until May 07 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Buren County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 815 AM EDT. * At 720 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paw Paw Lake, or 9 miles south of South Haven, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Paw Paw... Hartford... Mattawan... Lawton... Bangor... Van Buren SP... Pine Grove... Covert... Lawrence... Gobles... Breedsville... Glendale... Kendall... South Haven Area Reg... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
